New Records: Australia's 209 was their second highest successful run-chase in T20 international
India's 208 was their highest score against Australia in T20 international
India's 13-sixes was their joint fourth most sixes in an innings in T20 international
Cameron Green hammered a 26-ball second fastest fifty by an Australian batsman against India in T20Is
70 : Cameron Green and Steve Smith set up the record second-wicket partnership for Australia against India in T20 international
Key Match Events: Nathan Ellis and Josh Hazlewood's combined 5-wickets before An blazing maiden half-century from Cameron Green and Matthew Wade's quick-fire 21-ball 45* steers to Australia's record four-wicket victory over India
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Punjab Cricket Association IS Bindra Stadium, Mohali
